title: Häkkinen remembers his near-death F1 crash: 'The pain was unbelievable'
summary: Thirty years on from his nearly-fatal Adelaide F1 crash, Mika Häkkinen has recalled the harrowing journey back to competing on the grid again. The Finn told Motor Sport about the…
